description: This trap indicates that user has logged off the server.
tvSidLogoff and tvUserLogoff are the Session ID and user name
of the session, respectively.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MFAGENT-MIB::trapSessionLogoff MFAGENT-MIB::tvSidLogoff c 9999 MFAGENT-MIB::tvUserLogoff s EXAMPLE

description: The session ID of the session that just ended.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvSidLogoff

description: The user name of a session that just ended. When provided in a
trap, the string is not NULL terminated. However, if the
variable is read via GET/GETNEXT, it is NULL terminated.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvUserLogoff

description: This trap indicates that a user has logged on to the server.
tvSidLogon and tvUserLogon are the Session ID and user name
of the new session, respectively.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MFAGENT-MIB::trapSessionLogon MFAGENT-MIB::tvSidLogon c 9999 MFAGENT-MIB::tvUserLogon s EXAMPLE

description: Session ID of the new session.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvSidLogon

description: The user name of the new session. When provided in a
trap, the string is not NULL terminated. However, if the
variable is read via GET/GETNEXT, it is NULL terminated.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvUserLogon

description: This trap indicates that a session has been disconnected.
tvSidLogoff and tvUserLogoff are the Session ID and user name
of the session, respectively.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD MFAGENT-MIB::trapSessionDisc MFAGENT-MIB::tvSidDisc c 9999 MFAGENT-MIB::tvUserDisc s EXAMPLE

description: The session Id of the session that was disconnected.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvSidDisc

description: The user name of the session that was disconnected. When provided
in a trap, the string is not NULL terminated. However, if the
variable is read via GET/GETNEXT, it is NULL terminated.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvUserDisc

description: This trap indicates that the number of sessions on the server
has passed the threshold that the server can support.
tvSessThreshold is the number of sessions when the
threshold is reached.
The number of sessions when the session threshold is crossed.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvSessThreshold

description: This trap indicates that the server farm is running out of
connection licenses. The number of remaining licenses has
reached the lower threshold. tvLicThreshold is the number of
connection licenses remaining. tvLicOut is the License ID of the
license that reached the low threshold.

event.Summary: Server farm is running out of licenses, only $v1 remaining

description: The number of available ICA licenses when low threshold is crossed.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicThreshold

description: The license ID of the license that has reached the low
threshold or has run out of licenses.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicOut

description: This trap indicates that the server farm is out of connection
licenses. tvLicOut is the license ID of the license.

event.Summary: Server farm is out of connection licenses

description: The license ID of the license that has reached the low
threshold or has run out of licenses.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicOut

description: This trap indicates that request for a license has been
denied. tvLicDenied is used to show what license was denied.

event.Summary: License ID $v1 request for a license has been denied

description: The license ID of the request that has been denied.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicDenied

description: This trap indicates that the MetaFrame SNMP agent has
started on the server.
This trap indicates that a previous session threshold
exceeded condition has been resolved. The number of concurrent
sessions has fallen below the warning threshold.
tvSessThreshold is the number of concurrent sessions when the
condition was resolved.

event.Summary: Number of sessions is below threshold

description: The number of sessions when the session threshold is crossed.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvSessThreshold

description: This trap indicates that a previous low license threshold
condition has been resolved. tvLicThreshold contains the number
of available connection licenses. tvLicOut is the
license ID of the license indicated by the trap.

event.Summary: License threshold limit breach is resolved

description: The number of available ICA licenses when low threshold is crossed.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicThreshold

description: The license ID of the license that has reached the low
threshold or has run out of licenses.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicOut

description: This trap indicates that a previous out-of-license
condition has been resolved. The number of available licenses is
greater than the critical minimum available.
tvLicOut is the License Id of the license indicated by the trap.

event.Summary: Out of license condition has been resolved

description: The license ID of the license that has reached the low
threshold or has run out of licenses.
variables.name: MFAGENT-MIB::tvLicOut
